Body:
global uid
global pet_id
res = client.put('/users/' + uid + '/pets/' + pet_id)
assert res.status_code == 200
assert res.json == {'result': 'OK'}
res = client.put('/users/' + uid, data=json.dumps({'first_name': 'Alex',
    'last_name': 'Douglas', 'phone_number': '123456'}), headers={
    'Content-Type': 'application/json'})
assert res.status_code == 200
if 'uid' in res.json:
    uid = res.json['uid']
assert 'uid' in res.json
res = client.put('/users/' + uid, data=json.dumps({'first_name': 123,
    'last_name': 'Douglas', 'phone_number': '123456'}), headers={
    'Content-Type': 'application/json'})
assert res.status_code == 422
assert 'errors' in res.json
res = client.put('/pets/' + pet_id, data=json.dumps({'name': 'Puppy'}),
    headers={'Content-Type': 'application/json'})
assert res.status_code == 200
if 'pet_id' in res.json:
    pet_id = res.json['pet_id']
assert 'pet_id' in res.json
res = client.put('/users/' + uid + '/pets/' + pet_id)
assert res.status_code == 200
assert res.json == {'result': 'OK'}
res = client.put('/users/' + uid + '/cars/123123')
assert res.status_code == 404
assert 'errors' in res.json
